title: Identification of acetaldehyde based on plasmonic patterns of a gold nanostructure conjugated with chromophore and H2O2: a new platform for the rapid and low-cost analysis of carcinogenic agents by colorimetric affordable test strip (CATS)
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15755-15765
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02814G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Fatemeh Farshchi, Arezoo Saadati, Farnaz Bahavarnia, Mohammad Hasanzadeh, Nasrin Shadjou
A new portable device has been created to specifically detect acetaldehyde by using gold nano-flowers.
